title: Mixed Reality Design
description: Project-based course in designing implementing experiences using the technologies of Augmented, Mixed, and Virtual Reality. Credit not awarded for both LMC 4733 and CS 4770/6770/LMC 6340.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: LMC 2700 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
